_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The eight factors of the Sabbath [an8.42: Giving up high and luxurious beds
Living full of compassion for all living beings
Not wearing garlands or applying perfumes
Sleeping on a low bed or a mat on the ground
Not killing living creatures, stealing, lying, or drinking alcohol
Being celibate, refraining from sex, and not eating at night
The different realms and their time scal: The Gods of the Four Great Kings - 500 divine years
The Gods of the Thirty-Three - 1000 divine years
The Gods of Yama - 2000 divine years
The Gods Who Love to Create - 8000 divine years
The Gods Who Control the Creations of Others - 16000 divine years
The things that should be done during th: Not wearing garlands or applying perfumes
Sleeping on a low bed or a mat on the ground
Living full of compassion for all living beings
The things that are less valuable than t: Natural gold dug up by marmots
